availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farmer. Logan County, Kentucky, native. Son of Elijah Mansfield. Married to [Unknown] Grumman Mansfield. Father of Pernecia Ann Mansfield and Cyrus G. Mansfield. Married to Mahala Lee Mansfield in Butler County, Kentucky, on October 28, 1841.Father of George Mansfield, James Mansfield, and William Mansfield. Farmer in Logan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Logan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 37B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 471.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Butler County, Rochester, p. 381B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 4365.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Logan County Marriages, Film 000367208, p. 45.
